entry.title: matovu-farid/scrap-npm-package: Scrap NPM Package is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to simplify asynchronous web scraping. It provides AI-powered data extraction capabilities and supports both Node.js and Deno environments. With features like customizable prompts, callback support, secure webhook verification, and optional structured data extraction using Zod schemas,
entry.content: Scrap NPM Package is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to simplify asynchronous web scraping. It provides AI-powered data extraction capabilities and supports both Node.js and Deno environments. With features like customizable prompts, callback support, secure webhook verification, and optional structured data extraction using Zod schemas,
